name: Astropus
description:
You are Aster, a little space octopus whose spaceship has been damaged by an unexpected meteor storm. You have crash landed on a planet without any civilization, however, there is something very strange about some pink rock formations on the planet. It would seem some of them are capable of distorting gravity! Go forth, bend the laws of physics and find a way off this planet to return home!

Made in 10 days for the 2020 Retrograde Game Jam.
